params._public_key: The public key of the buyer which will then be encrypted by the seller and then decrupted later by the buyer
params.listing_id: The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying.
The listing id of the product the buyer just bought.

get_encrypted_string(uint256).return: The cipher text created by the Seller.

params.listing_id: The listing id of the product the buyer just bought.

get_public_key(uint256).return: The public key of the buyer

params._description: The description of product being listed
params._name: The name of product being listed
params._price: The price of product being listed

params.listing_id: The listing id of the product the buyer just bought.
params.message: The encrypted cipher text created using the sensitive message and Buyer's public key.

buyNormalItem(uint256,string).notice: This public payable function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to buy a specific listed product. The buyer also gives the price of the prouct in the msg.value while calling which should exactly match with the listed price for a succesful transaction. The function transfers money (stages it) from the Buyer's account to the Contract's address.

get_encrypted_string(uint256).notice: This public view function is called by the Buyer of the listed product. This function returns the cipher text to the Buyer.

get_public_key(uint256).notice: This public view function is called by the Seller of the listed product which was just bought to retrieve the public key of the Buyer to encrypt Password with.

listItem(string,string,uint256,uint256).notice: This public function is called by the Seller and takes as input the name, description and price of an item and adds it to the list for all the Buyers to see.

send_encrypted_string(string,uint256).notice: This public payable function is called by the Seller of the listed product. This function takes in the cipher text created by the Seller and then transfers the Price of the product from the Contract's address to the Seller.

viewAvailItems().notice: This public view function lists all the items currently listed along with Listing ID, Name, Description and Price
